sentences.en: " Archie's carrying him to the vacant lot near Belle's.
sentences.cn: " 阿尔奇正在把他搬到贝尔家附近的空地去.

sentences.en: " At Belle Watling's sporting house,'said Rhett, looking abashed.
sentences.cn: " 在贝尔-沃特琳赌场, "瑞德边说, 脸上边显出难为情的的样子.

sentences.en: " Her name Belle Watling,'said Uncle Peter, his lower lip beginning to protrude.
sentences.cn: " 她叫贝尔-沃特琳, " 彼得大叔答道.

sentences.en: " Well -- " began Rhett awkwardly, " as a matter of fact, he was at Belle's tonight. "
sentences.cn: " 不过 ---- " 瑞德感到不大好说, " 事实上, 他今天晚上的确去过贝尔那里.

sentences.en: Belle: Good morning. I've come to return the book I borrowed.
sentences.cn: 贝莉: 早上好! 我来还我借的书.

sentences.en: Belle: If you hadn frightened me, I wouldn have run away!
sentences.cn: 你如果你不吓唬我, 我也不会跑掉.

sentences.en: Belle: Thank you for understanding how much he needs me.
sentences.cn: 贝尔: 谢谢你能理解他是多么的需要我.
到贝尔-沃特琳住的地方去.

sentences.en: He plumped himself on having the belle of the ball as his date.
sentences.cn: 他因其女伴为该舞会之花而感到骄傲.

sentences.en: Maurice: Belle, I want you to leave this place.
sentences.cn: 毛利斯: 贝莉, 我要你离开这个地方.

sentences.en: Most desolating were those evenings the belle - mere had envisaged for them.
sentences.cn: 最最凄凉的要数 婆婆 给她们设计的夜晚.

sentences.en: My younger sister is a belle, everyone likes her!
sentences.cn: 我妹妹是个美女, 每个人都喜欢她!

sentences.en: She has been the ruling belle - the blazing star.
sentences.cn: 她是首屈一指的美人,一颗灿烂的明星.

sentences.en: She was the belle of her Sunday School class.
sentences.cn: 在主日学校她是她们班的班花。

sentences.en: Strange that Belle's should be the first familiar face she saw.
sentences.cn: 真奇怪,她首先看到的那张熟悉面孔竟然是贝尔的!

sentences.en: The boots with various design makes us dazzling, wear fashionably build the modern belle that helps you make spring.
sentences.cn: 款式繁多的靴子让我们眼花缭乱，入时的穿搭帮你成为春季的时髦美女。
